meanings.sent1: The metalline tools gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The metalline structure of the building made it strong and durable.
meanings.sent3: The robot had a metalline exterior that made it look futuristic.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a metalline quality, cold and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The metalline taste of the water reminded him of coins.

meanings.sent1: The metalline paint on the car gave it a shiny appearance.
meanings.sent2: Her laughter had a metalline ring to it, bright and clear.
meanings.sent3: The cat's eyes had a metalline glow in the dark.
meanings.sent4: His words had a metalline sharpness that cut through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The metalline scent of the air hinted at rain approaching.

meanings.sent1: The metalline alloy was used to create the new spacecraft.
meanings.sent2: The metalline taste of the soup came from the metal spoon left in it.
meanings.sent3: The metalline content of the rock made it heavy to lift.
meanings.sent4: The metalline sound of the bells echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The metalline texture of the fabric was smooth and cool to the touch.
